Uses of Class
org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.EntryLogMetadata

  • Packages that use EntryLogMetadata 
    Package Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie
    Provides a Bookie server that stores entries for clients.
    org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.storage
    Provides a Bookie server that stores entries for clients.
    org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.storage.directentrylogger
    Support for bookie entry logs using Direct IO.
    org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.storage.ldb
    Classes related to DB based ledger storage.
